borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.0pt;margin-left:0cm"><u><span style="font-size:11.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Noise </span></u><span style="font-size:11.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.0pt;margin-left:0cm"><span style="font-size:11.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">No music , amplified
sound, impact noise or other form of noise including singing, shouting ,
chanting, and loud voice etc. shall be used or generated which is audible
outside of the building at the boundary with the nearest noise sensitive
property. <o:p></o:p></span></p><p>



</p><p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:7.0pt;margin-left:0cm"><i><span style="font-size:11.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Reason: In order to
protect neighbouring amenity in accordance with Policy BP8 of the Borough Wide
DPD (2011)&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><u><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Opening
Hours : <o:p></o:p></span></u></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">The development
hereby permitted shall not operate outside the hours of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;line-height:107%;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">09:00
– 21:00 &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mon – Fri</span><o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;line-height:107%;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">09:00
-17:00 &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Saturday
and Sunday and Bank Holidays</span><o:p></o:p></p><p>







<i><span style="line-height: 107%;"><font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 11pt;">Reason: In the
interest of protecting </span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">neighboring</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;amenity</span></font></span></i><br></p>

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

- DRAWING XXX REV XX DATED XX
- USE [SHIFT]+[ENTER] FOR REGULAR LINE SPACING
- USE [ENTER] FOR LARGER LINE SPACING

No other drawings or documents apply.
description: Retrospective change of use from housing office (Class E) to a community centre (Class F2 (b))
